name: LUX AIR JET CENTERS
description: Client is a Fixed Base Operator at Goodyear Airport, providing general aviation services
sampleDescriptions: Provide assistance with FAA AIP programmatic funding Assist with proposal to provide facilities for a United States Forest Service Air Tanker Base.
